item.description:
Specific Topic: Perception - Our Own Maps of the World

One of NLP's per-suppositions is - Respect for other person's map of the world.  This has  a built in per-supposition that everyone has a different map.  This month's discussion and exercises are geared towards a deep dive into what I think is one of the most important theme's of NLP

  • What's your map like?
  • Do you know your map is not the territory?
  • Do you know that others don't necessarily think and act the way you would, and why?
  • What is perception is projection?
  • How does rapport play into this?

 

Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 866.837.2133 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com
item.how_to_find_us: Garden Room - Bottom Floor (please check meeting list at desk at the entrance for any changes)

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Methuen - Perception - Our Own Maps of the World
